import React, { useState } from 'react' import "./oneUser.css" import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome" import { faLock , faLockOpen , faPen} from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; const OneUser = (props) => { const [block,setBlocked] = useState(false) const handleBlock = () => { setBlocked(!block) } return (
{props.user.nom+" "+props.user.prenom}
{props.user.cin}
{ block ? {handleBlock()}} /> : {handleBlock()}}/> } {handleBlock()}} /> {handleBlock()}}/> ) } export default OneUser
